alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 21 at 4:42AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Periods of freezing rain will result in total ice accumulations ranging between 0.20 to 0.40 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. The freezing rain may mix with or change to a period of sleet and or snow prior to ending early Saturday morning. Northern areas could see half inch or greater of snow and sleet accumulation. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The forecast ice accumulations will make traveling extremely hazardous if not impossible. Scattered to numerous power outages and tree damage will occur.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
